Metadata.title: LM Speed - LLM API Speed Test & Ranking
Metadata.description: Professional LLM API speed testing tool providing real-time performance analysis and global speed rankings. Supporting multiple LLM service providers to help developers choose the optimal API provider and optimize application performance

Nav.title: LM Speed Provider Navigation
Nav.subtitle: Here is a list of all API providers used in LM Speed tests

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.disclaimer: LM Speed does not store your API key, only used for one-time testing

modelId.label: Model ID
modelId.placeholder: Fetch model ID first, then select

submit.default: Run Speed Test (5 rounds, Est. 6000 tokens)

performance.question: How does LM Speed conduct performance testing?
performance.answer: LM Speed employs a five-round continuous stress testing mechanism. Token calculations are performed accurately using tiktoken.

comparison.question: How to compare performance between different API providers?
comparison.answer: Through standardized performance testing and ranking features, you can visually compare the performance of different providers' APIs. The system automatically analyzes and displays comparative data for various performance metrics, helping you choose the most suitable model and provider.

latency.avgLatency: Average response time for the first token, reflecting initial response speed
latency.maxMinLatency: Maximum and minimum response times for the first token, showing latency variation range
latency.title: Latency Metrics
latency.totalTests: Total number of completed tests, higher values indicate more reliable data

performance.avgTokens: Average tokens generated per second in a single test, reflecting real-time response speed
performance.maxMinTokens: Maximum and minimum tokens per second observed in a single test, showing performance variation range
performance.title: Performance Metrics
performance.totalAvgTokens: Cumulative average tokens per second across all tests, reflecting long-term stable performance
